article.title: Lockheed Martin Awarded Contract for Army and Marine Corps Rocket System
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Lockheed Martin Corporation's Missiles and Fire Control has been awarded a $180 million firm-fixed-price cost-plus-fixed-fee contract, of which the requirement includes High Mobility Artillery Rocket System (HIMARS) Full-Rate Production (FRP 4) launchers in support of the U.S. Army and the U.S. Marine Corps.
